text: Deap Vally is a pair of Americans, Lindsey Troy and Julie Edwards, who make music together. They started their band in Los Angeles in 2011. Lindsey sings and plays the guitar. Julie plays the drums. ==Career== They met at a needlework class that Julie Edwards was teaching. Lindsey Troy was performing music on her own at the time. Edwards was playing drums and keyboards and singing in a band called The Pity Party In July 2012 they released their first single "Gonna Make My Own Money" on Ark Recordings. The next month the band was signed to Island Records. Their first album Sistrionix was released in June 2013. ==References== Category:2010s American music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2011 Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from California Category:2011 establishments in California
title: Deap Vally
